rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// //
sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i shing gi ze ba zhes
bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal kun tu ston cing sgrib pa med par rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugaso/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na
'jig rten gyi khams bairdur+ya yi rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug zil gyis mi non pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi legs par spel ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i 'od kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po zhes

bya ba bzhugaso/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor lo brtan par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi sprul pa'i pad mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud

zhing la yongasu 'du ba rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings

rgyas par 'gengs pa la rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos dang nor bu'i nyi ma sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs

yongasu gzhol bar rnam par dmigs pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi rgyud spyod pa kun nas rgyal po'i gsung sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbyangs zab mo mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud

phyogs tha dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu shes so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho snying po dang ldan zhing shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud

phyogs tha mi dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongasu dag pa'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rgyud rgyan thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan dan gyi dbyangs shin tu rnam par phye ba'i stegs bu'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgrengs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal po 'od zer gyis shin tu bsgrub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi stobs kun tu snang ba yongasu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dbang po mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa de dang 'dab chagasu

spos chu'i rgya mtsho dngul gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyis bsgrub pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud yongs su bstsal bar kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab

chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya'i spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab

chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho phyogs kun tu gzi brjid kyis rgyal ba'i phung po 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs rnam par phye bar 'phrul pa zhes bya ba rab tu

gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho gser gyi rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal po'i dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rdo rje'i rtse mo zhing gi rgyal mtshan
zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tha dad pa med pa'i sprin 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par gnon
pa'i gtsug ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i me tog zad mi shes pa shin tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi rgyud 'od mtha' yas pa rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho zhing gser ltar yongs su dag pa grags pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/

de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi tshon tu bstan pa'i gnas shes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho myig yor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten

gyi khams kyi rgyud las kyis kun tu brgyan cing rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra dbyangs zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rgyud rab tu brgyus pa la mngon du blta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la stsogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol du 'khor yug gi

mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba stug po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba snying po byang chub thams
cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yi lhun can rab tu gnas so/ /de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i mig sna tshogs shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par snang ba rdo rje'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig

rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams

kha dog ud pa la dang / dpal gyi be'u zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod pa de na
'jig rten gyi khams mtshams rdo rje ltar sra ba sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bstsal ba'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la/ sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zil

gyis mi non par mngon par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi mdzod shin tu bstsags pa zhes bya ba de dang / 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho

rin po chi'i 'od snang bas rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brags pa'i dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho

rin po che tshad med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan nyid namakha' lta bur rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su
spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thogs pa med par kun tu snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /

de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing tsan dan gyi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas par 'khyil pa'i phyogs su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /

de dang 'dab chagasu gser rin po che'i gram bu rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la zhing gi 'khor lo rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dang 'dab chagasu

spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor kun na/ rdo rje'i me tog gi 'byung gnas yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par phye ba bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang

'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par rig pa chags pa med pas sangs rgyas blta ba rab tu

gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi rin po che'i phreng bas stsogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud blo gros dge ba mtha' yas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba rab tu gnas

so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho mu tig sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi yul dang smon lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba

zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la stsogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol 'khor yug gi 'tshams na spos chu'i
rgya mtsho 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun tu sgras sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhan dang /

gzhan gyi sgor rab tu 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ngo / /de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bas gsol pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi
khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis rnam par 'phags pa'i sems kyi rgyal po
zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/
'jig rten gyi khams stobs bcu'i brgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing
rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par 'byung ba'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la/
'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya

mtsho rin po ches mthun par rnam par brgyan pa/ de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od gzer gyi mdzod kyi ri bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud namakha'i sprin

yangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan sna tshogs kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma

med cing sgrib pa med par rnam par phye ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i pad mo 'dab ma stug po rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rgyud kyi lus kyi brgyan dam pa'i mar me zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byung gnas shes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yang dag par bsgrubs pa shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/
de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i ze ba byin gyis rlabs kyi gnas shes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shin tu gtsang ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ba
yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud lus dam pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs kyi phung po 'tshan pa zhes bya ba

yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud namakha' rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid dag cing yangs pas rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/

de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud in+d+ra ni la'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa skar mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho yid du 'ong bar gram pa'i nor bu mu tig rnam par

snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyings kyi kun tu sgrog pa'i nga ro la dga' ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag las stsogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med

pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho in+d+ra ni la rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun tu snang

zhing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'byung bar nga ro sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba dam pa'i snying po

zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog gi blo gros dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par gnas pa'i rgyan
ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhag par 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/

'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yas bsgrub pa kun nas 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la

'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul

pa mi zad pa'i sprin gyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba bzhugaso/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra rdo rje ltar shin tu brtan pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing togs kyi bskor ba shin tu 'phags

pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i rgyal mtshan shin tu sgreng ba zhes bya ba rab tu bzhugaso/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa

zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba thams cad shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i sprin dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod

de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi rin po che'i thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gis

ze ba'i kha dog kyi brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dge ba'i tshogs kyi gzi brjid rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos dam pas shin

tu rgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gi yal ga rtsegs pa zhes bya ba

yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin la shin tu rten pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/
de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chags pa med pa'i rdo rje kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho kun nas pad mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/

de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i ngogs mtha' yas pa'i glong zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i yan lag dam pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba

yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dag zhing gzhi rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de las stsogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed kyi pha rol khor yug gi mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho myi phyed par brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo
zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'jug pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams spos shin tu zhim pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na

de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang sprul pa tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod

pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan dang tshul gyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad med pa'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten
gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i phyogs me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i spyan 'od 'phro ba'i

sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chu yi lha 'od 'phro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba

bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer dang nor bu'i shing togs kyi brgyan pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba'i 'khor los rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshon gyi srang rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de

de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brgyus pa du mas 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu gang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i dra ba rnam par phye ba kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten

gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan dam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rgyud 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa rgya mtsho'i sgra zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho nyi ma'i gnas yongs su sbyong ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/

de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul gyis rgyas par 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sil snyen thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba brjod

pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud glong thams cad kyi gting du rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan dam pas bsgrub pa rnam pa

sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'od dri ma med pa'i sprin stug po 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me 'od 'phro bas

kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi dbyibs tha dad pa byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la stsogs pa spos chu'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho phreng ba dang / gos kyis shin tu bsgrub pa zhes bya ba yod de/
de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun nas snang ba gos bzang po shin tu sprul pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shin tu sgrog
pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ngo / /de thams cad kyi 'og na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbang po'i me tog ze ba 'khyil pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu sgrol bas
dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes kyi pham pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'bru'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba tshad med pas dgyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugaso/ /de'i steng na 'jig

rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdan pad+mo dang seng ge zhes

bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs dri ma med cing

mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugaso/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi steng na/ 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi rgyud klu'i rin po che'i kha dog gi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
pa chos kyi dbyings yongs su gsal bar rnam par snang bar zhes bya ba bzhugaso/ /kye de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i rgya
mtsho de dag la nor bu'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa'i myig yor gi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang / ldan pa'i pad+mo la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ /'jig
rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhan dang gzhan can mang po dang / mtshams 'dab chags su gnas pa sha stag go 'od rin po che gzhan dang gzhan gyi kha dog tu 'gyed pa sha stag go/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor
gyi sprin gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun nas yog pa sha stag go/ /rgyan rnam par bres pa'i 'od gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go/ /bskal pa'i grangs dang tshul gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa sha stag go/ /
sangs rgyas gzhan dang gzhan skye zhing gshegs pa sha stag go/ /chos rgya mtsho'i sgra gzhan dang gzhan rab tu bsgrags pa sha stag go/ /sems can gyi lus gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun tu yog pa sha
stag go/ /phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 'jug pa ma 'dres pa sha stag go/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go/ /
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba rgyan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi
khams rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad yongasu gang ngo / /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig
gi rgyud nas byung ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa mtshams dang sgo rnams dang tshogs kyi brgyan la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba

sna tshogs thams cad las byung ba kun kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di thams cad yongasu gang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos

yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs
bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten khams ni rgya mtsho'i rnams/ /yangs dang myi yangs sna tshogs pa/ /nam mkha' dag gi dbyings la gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings
ni tha mi dad/ /'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho na/ /zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/ /tha dad med par rnam par gnas/ /rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go/ /rnam phye sna tshogs shin tu gnas/ /

kha dog tha dad rab tu 'dug /zhing gi rgyud dag rnam phye ba/ /'jig rten khams kyi gang chen mtsho/ /lhun dang dbyangs rnams tha dad de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul ba/ /zhing gzhan rgyud rnams rab tu

snang / /las kyi de dag shin tu bris/ /ri rab rgya mtsho'i dra ba dang / /'khor lo klong gi dkyil 'khor dang / /pad+mo'i dbyings 'dra 'byam klas pa/ /de dag de yi kun nas bskor/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs
pa dang / /rdo rje kun nas 'khor gnas pa/ /'byam klas bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /de dag rgyud ni kun nas bskor/ /'od kyi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /mu tig 'dog kyang rgya mtsho ste/ /zhing gis

rgyud rnams kun kyang 'bar/ /pad+mo la yang kun gnas so/ /re re dag gi rgyud las kyang / /'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /'od zer dag gi zhing gyur cing / /rgya mtsho'i phyogs rnams kun tu 'gengs/ /zhing gi rgyud
rnams thams cad kyis/ /dmigs pa kun kyi sgo nas kyang / /thams cad tshul la 'jigs pa yis/ /mi zad tshul rnams rab tu snang / /zhing gi rnams ni bsam mi khyab/ /rgyud rnams mi zad shin tu 'byung /
rgyan rnams bstan pa tha dad de/ /drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs so/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams de dag na/ /'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab khams/ /kun nas 'du zhing rnam par 'jigs/ /'byung zhing 'jig par
de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji ltar shing la lo ma rnams/ /'byung zhing lhung bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/ /'jig rten khams na 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar shing gi skye gnas nas/ /shing
thog sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/ /sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar sa bon khyad par gyis/ /'bras bu sna tshogs snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin las kyi
khyad par gyis/ /sems can rnams dang zhing byung ngo / /yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams/ /kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar/ /sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang /
klu yi rgyal po sprin gyis rnams/ /namakha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/ /zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis/ /
sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo / /ji ltar ri mo'i gzugs kyi rnams/ /ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar/ /
de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun/ /sems kyi ri mor bris pa yin/ /sems can lus kyi rnam pa dag /ji ltar sems kyi brtags pa ltar/ /de bzhin zhing gi rnam pa yang / /thams cad
las kyis rnam par bris/ /ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin/ /mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o/ /pad+mo'i dra ba'i phyi rol

gyis/ /sems can zhing gi mtshams dag na/ /dbyibs dang kha dog gzhan dang gzhan/ /dri ma med pa sna tshogs snang / /pad+mo'i dra ba de dag la/ /zhing gi dra ba rab tu gnas/ /rgyan dang bstan pa sna tshogs
te/ /sems can sna tshogs mang po'i gnas/ /zhing gi dbyings rnams la la ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par gnas/ /sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs las/ /chos nyid de dag nang na snang / /kun nas
nyon mongs rnams dag tu/ /zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/ /sems can bsam pas rab tu byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'khod/ /la la rnam dag nyon mongs can/ /zhing gi dbyings ni
rnam pa mang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul/ /rgya mtsho'i las las byung ba yin/ /zhing rnams la la'i 'od btang ba/ /rin chen rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dri med
dag /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams la la na/ /bskal pa'i mye ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnams la ston/ /zhing gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sra/ /rlung gi
phung po smon lam dang / /chu yis phung la rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rnam pa shin tu mang / /sems can rnams kyi bsags pa yin/ /zhing ni gzhan dang gzhan dag gi/ zhing gi chos nyid snang la ltos/ /
de dag 'byung ba gang yang med/ /de dag la ni 'jig pa med/ /skad cig skad cig sems kun la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /zhing rnams rab tu 'byung ba rnams/ /shin tu dri med dag
pa ltos/ /zhing rnams la la sa yis dngos/ /sra bar de dag byung gyur cing / /snang ba med cing 'ong ba'ang med/ /sdig pa'i las kyi gnas yin no/ /zhing rnams la la rdo rje'i dngos/ /kun nas nyon
mongs 'jigs pa che/ /bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang / /bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin/ /zhing rnams la la lcags kyi dngos/ /la la zangs kyi dngos su gnas/ /sdig pa'i las kyi

kun tu gang / /ri dang brag gi mnyam pa med/ /'jig rten de na dmyal ba yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal skyabs med pa/ /mun pa rjesu rnyed gyur cing / /mye lce rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar/ /'on kyang byol song skye
gnas su/ /lus ni mngon par byung gyur te/ /bdag gi las kyi nyes pa yi/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba rab tu myong / /gshin rjes 'jig rten rnams na'ang snang / /skom dang bkres pas rab tu gnar/ /mye yis
ri yi gdung ba yi/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba 'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /la la rin chen bdun las byung / /la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas/ /dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste/ /sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu
brgyan/ /mi dang lha rnams la la ni/ /mtho ris dag gi 'jig rten na/ /dge ba'i bsod nams 'bras bur ldan/ /dga' bde myong ba de dag ltos/ /spu'i rtse mo gcig la yang / /zhing rnams bye ba
bsam mi khyab/ /sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de/ /de dag 'dres pa gang yang med/ /rang rang so so'i las kyi na/ /sems can khams rnams bsam mi khyab/ /'du shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams/ /
bde dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong / /zhing rnams la la mtha' yas 'od/ /sems can mang don kun nas ni/ /yongs 'byung rdo rje ut+pa la/ /sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med/ /zhing rnams la la 'od
zer 'phros/ /'od kyi 'khor la kun nas gnas/ /tsan dan gser las yongs su byung / /'od 'phro sprin gyis mdog dang mnyam/ /zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos/ /spos kyi gos kyi kun nas yog /la la
pad+mo gcig la ste/ /byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas/ /la la mtshan gyi mdog dang 'od/ /zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med/ /mig 'phrul 'od kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'od zer dra bas snang bar byas/ /
zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang / /pad mos yongs su gos la gnas/ /la la nor bu'i 'od kyang yin/ /zhing rnams yongs su dag la ltos/ /me tog glong las la la byung / /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing
la ltos/ /sangs rgyas sprul pas kun tu khyab/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam/ /la la me tog shing rnams dang / /lo ma'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs te/ /nor bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /
zhing gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag /zhing rnams la la pad mo dngos/ /snang ba bzang pos rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas sprul bas gsung yang yin/ /zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /rin chen cod pan

sna tshogs dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang / /gzhan las de bzhin la la byung / /'od dang sprul pa'ang rab tu 'gyed/ /tsan dan phye ma sna tshogs dang / /mdzod spu rnam par snang ba'i 'od/ /
sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'od zer rnams/ /zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod/ /la la rgyan dang 'od gcig par/ /zhing rnams dri ma med pa snang / /la la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs

rab tu brgyan/ /la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi/ rgyan gyis mngon par rab tu brgyan/ /la la zhing rnams stong dag kyang / /rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rgyan mang bya ba yis/ /zhing rnams la la

rnam par bres/ /rgyan dang tshul rnams tha dad par/ /sna tshogs mig yor lta bur snang / /brjod du med pa'i zhing gi rnams/ /rgyan gcig la yang rab tu snang / /'od ni zhing dang gzhan bkye ba/ /sangs rgyas
smon lam mthu las byung / /smon lam rgya mtsho rnams mang bas/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs/ /de dag rgyan mang thams cad du/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho shin tu snang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam
gyis/ /zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun la dus gsum gyis/ /zhing gi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang / /zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa/ /kye ma rgyal sras kho na ltos/ /ma 'ong pa'i

zhing rnams kyang / /rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang / /ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /'das pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho yang / /zhing gcig nang na thams cad snang / /mig yor bzhin du sprul pa yin/ /
dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rnam sprul zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /zhing gi rgyud ni 'di la snang / /kun kyang nang na yod par gnas/ /zhing gi rdul gyi rtse mo la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
rnam 'phrul pa/ /shong ba de dag kun na snang / /mig yor mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /la la rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dug /zhing rgya mang po de dag ltos/ /ri rab ri yis dbyibs 'dra dang / /'jig rten
khams ni bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/ /mig yor dbyings su gnas pa ste/ /sna tshogs shing gi dbyings su gnas/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu khyab/ /zhing rnams
nor bu 'khor lo'i dbyibs/ /la la pad ma'i dbyibs su gnas/ /yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang / /sna tshogs kha dog dri ma med/ /la la khri yi dbyibs lta bu/ /gra bzhi dbyibs
dang khyad khyud de/ /la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug /tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas/ /lha yis dbang po gtsug phud dbyibs/ /zla ba khams ltar la la gnas/ /nor bu'i ri yi dbyibs su
'khod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs kyang 'dra/ /spos chu mtsho yi klong lta bu/ /'jig rten khams rnams rab tu gnas/ /'di yis dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi sbyangs/ /
'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu/ /'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor de/ /mdzod spu'i spyi gtsug dbyibs lta bu/ /la la mig gi tshul yang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu/ /
la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug /'od 'phro ri yis dbyibs kyang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang / /zhing rnams la la seng ge'i dbyibs/ /nor bu'i go car mngon par bsgrubs/ /
gzugs dang dbyibs ni du ma ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang / /zhing gi dbyibs rnams mi zad pa/ /rab tu gnas pa'i byin rlabs dang / /
sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung / /zhing rnams la la bskal pa tsam/ /la la bskal pa bcu pa ste/ /zhing rnams la la rdul mnyam pa yi/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin/ /
la la bskal pa gcig la yang / /zhing rnams mang po 'byung ba snang / /tshad med grangs kyang med pa ste/ /'jig pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med/ /
zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas bcas/ /la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcig /la la sangs rgyas mang po yis/ /sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing rnams dang / /'jig rten gzhan gyi khams su yang / /

sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing / /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang / /byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang / /bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor ba ston/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /'jig rten kun na tha mi dad/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams re re yang / /
rgyal ba gcig ni skyer 'gyur te/ /lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du/ /chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston/ /sems can snod du ma gyur la/ /sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bsam dang
ldan pas ni/ /de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong / /sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams/ /zhing rnams re re dag tu yang / /sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye/ /
rgyal ba so so de dag na/ /sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing / /chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas/ /sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ /zhing rnams la la 'od med de/ /mun pa 'jigs pa
shin tu che/ /reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra/ /blta na mi bzad skyi yang g.ya'/ /zhing rnams la la lha 'od can/ /la la khyim gyi 'od can te/ /la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan/ /zhing gi dra ba
bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od/ /shing gi 'od can dri ma med/ /gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba/ /de dag sems can dge las byung / /la la ri yis 'od can ste/ /
zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/ /la la mar me'i 'od can te/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyi byang / /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu gang /
zhing rnams la la pad mo'i 'od/ /'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams la la me tog 'od/ /spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od/ spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro can/ /smon lam dbang gis
rnam par sbyangs/ /zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can/ /nor bu'i 'od kyi gang bar snang / /sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis snang / /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan/ /rin chen cod pan 'od dang
ldan/ /rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyi snang / /yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ /de dag na ni sdug bsngal med/ /thams cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang / /zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/ /la la snying po
byang chub 'od/ /'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog /kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang / /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i

'od/ /zhing rnams la la me yi 'od/ /zhing rnams la la 'jig sgra can/ /mi zad 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ /rtsub cing brlang ba'i sgra rnams dang / /yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog /dmyal ba byol song kyi gnas

dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams/ /mya ngan rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rnams/ /nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung / /la la dag na yid 'ong sgra/ /dga' bar byed cing ston 'doms pa/ /bde ba'i las rnams

'bras bu'i dbyangs/ /zhing gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog /la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs/ /gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang / /la la'i zhing na rab tu grag /zhing rnams la la

sprin gyi sgra/ /rin chen rgya mtsho 'od zer dang / /nor bu'i shing gi gzugs sgra dang / /rol mo sgra yis kun tu khyab/ /'od zer klong gi sgra rnams dang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang / /byang chub sems pa'i

sgra dag dang / /'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang / /kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i/ /smon lam rgya mtsho'i nga ro dang / /spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan par 'byung / /
dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang / /de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i sgra/ /zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrogs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs
sgra dang / /tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin/ /chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang / /kha cig zhing na rab tu grag /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis/ /sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin/ /bskal par gnas
shing rab tu sgrog /sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes/ /zhing gi dbyangs rnams la la na/ /sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa yi/ /sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba/ /de dag kun na rab tu grags/
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa'i zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dgu pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/
bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i pad+mo mang po'i rgya mtsho la
rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha' yas

pas rgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ ri rab dang grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med

cing 'od rnam par snang bas brgyan pa/ zas dang skom dang / gos kyi longs spyod yid kyi bsam pas 'byung ba rgyan gyi rnam pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes

bya ba de'i dbus na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog gi ri rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis

bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgrengs
pa'i rgyan pa/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa/ rin po che'i rdo yi rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun tu
brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba dag gi kun nas bskor ba/ spos dang / rin po che'i pad+mo mang po dpag tu med pas kun tu brgyan pa/ rol mo sna tshogs
kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun tu rgyas pa/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun tu snang bar byas pa/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal chen po gang ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer chen po 'od

'phro snang ba zhes bya ba mi yi rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa chu dang zhing du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs

kyi shing togs dang / phru ma'i ra ba bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'obs spos kyi chus gang ba rin po che'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri kas rnam

par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang khang bu brtsegs pas rab tu rgyan pa/

steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang / in+d+ra ni la'i dra ba dang / rdo rje pad mo'i dra bas kun nas yog la/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang /

rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ spos dang phreng ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi rgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor kun nas sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de
sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che rdo yi rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /

bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las spos kyi dri kun tu byung ba
bya sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der myi skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ nam mkha'

las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa/ yid bzhin gyi yul longs spyod pa sha stag go/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na lha yis grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs log

na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtsho zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong

khyer gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dab chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dab chags su mdab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che

sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag la stsogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ /grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po nas/ /grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar du ste/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i

dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi yal ga stug cing rgya che ba'i dkyil
'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas pa spos dang / /mar me rin po che thams cad kha dog ltar 'dug

pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu 'gram pa/ rin po che'i 'od thur du 'phro bas kun tu khyab pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu 'od zer mang pos rnam
par snang bar byas/ /rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos spras pa/ rol mo thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/

phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba yod de/ de'i 'dun du pad+mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba brgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/ rtsa ba spos dang rin

po che dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zug pa/ chu bo rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i mdab ma can/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba dang / spos kyi ze ba'i
dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba pad mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs
bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der/ de bzhin gshegs

pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par
phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der lo brgya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/

nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ de yang rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu

gtong ba'i snying po can du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin/ phyogs bcu'i dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang khang khyim

gyi grong rdal thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang / dus gsum

gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu mthong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrag pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag byung ba 'jig rten gyi khams
der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyi khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa las dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang
snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang ltas mngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal

zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku
mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa/ mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams
cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyis dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od

kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de pad mo chen po de la mngon par 'byung bar gyur to/ /ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i
'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me

tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang / ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun na snang ngo / /

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag gis gling bzhi
pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal kyis smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas
'od gzer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing / zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag bkye ma
thag tu/ de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sgribs pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsil/ sangs rgyas blta ba la sgrib pa'i ri thams cad
kyang rnam par bcom/ sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag /dge ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag /mi khom pa
dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par gsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga'
ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od gzer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig
rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i
'od ces bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams
kyi dpal las stsogs pa stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bdun yod do/ /de la bu gzi brjid chen po la stsogs pa lnga brgya yod do/ /rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la stsogs
pa pa stong phrag bcu yod do/ /de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pas mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyud chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to/ /

bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa/ zhes bya ba'i

byams pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste tshul yangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya

ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste sgra yi sprin gyis kun tu rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags

pa'i zhes bya ba dga' ba chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste tshul gyi gzhi rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya

ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do/ /de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de
chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams/ /mkha' la mngon par 'phags
pa bzhin/ /snying po byang chub dri med la/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu sngon/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag gi/ mgon po 'jig rten byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams/ /rgyal ba kun na rab
tu snang / /ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab/ /gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang / /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag /'od 'phro sprin rnams
rab bkye ba/ /'od zer sprin la zad mi shes/ /'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las/ /'od gzer rnams ni dri med pa/ /
sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos/ /sangs rgyas gsungs ni yid 'ong ba/ /'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags/ /'gro kun dbyangs kyis
yan lag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi phog pa yi/ /sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi/ /'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi rnams/ /rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing / /ston pa'i sprin gyis rgyal po'i drung / /phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ong / /snying po byang chub 'di la yang / /rgyal ba rgya mtsho
zab mo'i sgra/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /kun kyang sri zhu ldan gyur te/ /dga' zhing shin tu mos byas shing / /chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir/ /

'jig rten mgon po'i drung du 'dong / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi

sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grag par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor

de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zhang blon rnams dang gzhon nu dang / /rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang / /tshongs pa rnams dang de bzhin du/ /yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig /grong khyer rnams ni kun tu

yang / /rnga sgra dag gi myur du sgrogs/ /kun kyang 'thun par lhan cig tu/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir deng shig /srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang / /dge ba'i dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig /bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas

pa/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'dong / /grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis/ /rgyan rnams kun tu bla re bres/ /rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams/ /nor bu sna tshogs rgyan par sgreng / /rin chen dra ba'i

bla re rnams/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du bre bar gyis/ /nam mkha' 'di las thams cad du/ /sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung / /lam gyi srang yang brgyan par gyis/ /rin chen char yang kun tu phob/ /gzhon pa rin

chen ston par gyis/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob shig /rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dag par bgyis/ /

spos dang pad+mo 'od kyi sprin/ /me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang / /se mo do dang phreng sprin dang / /gos kyi sprin gyi char phob shig /ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri/ /nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par bgyis/ /

dri med tsan dan phye ma rnams/ /namakha'i dkyil la rab tu ston/ /nor bu'i phreng ba me tog phreng / /rin chen phreng ba dri med dang / /rin chen sgron gyi phreng ba rnams/ /namakha'i dbyings la bsgrub par gyis/ /

thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la/ /dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de/ /bu dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnams/ /rgyal ba lta phyir kun 'dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i
bdag po bsod nams dpal la stsogs pa bud med stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la stsogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs las stsogs pa blon po stong phrag drug

bcu dang / de dag la stsogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun bcu rtsa bdun gyi bskor cing bdar te/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas sde'i 'khor dang bcas pa namakha'i dbyings su mngon
par 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po mthu chen pos namakha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba nas kyang lha'i dbang po rab tshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
ba lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /klu'i

grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma myed pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan gcig gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang

gnod sbyin bye ba bdun bcu dang lhan cig dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po nas kyang dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig tu/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer

'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ namakha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che

sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang namakha' lding gi dbang po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba namakha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas

kyang mi'am ci'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig /lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che

grags pa'i rgyal mtshan chos bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig /tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyi pham pa zhes
bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de dag la stsogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas/ sems
can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi
sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas pa bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems
can rnams la yongs su ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzung 'di bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab

kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par bsgrub pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes kyi snang ba rab

tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste thogs ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang

ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes

kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste sgo yang

pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba

rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad
med par 'jug pa la mngon par bsgrub pa ye shes kyi rgya mtsho rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmyigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par bsgrub pa rgya
mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmyigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad

mngon du bstan pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang / mi 'jig pa thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba
rab tu thob bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi/ ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos nas/ /bdag gis ye shes snang ba skyes/ /des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa/ /rgya mtsho
rnams kyang rab tu mthong / /sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur/ /phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang mthong / /mtshan gyi rnam pa rnams dmigs dang / /gang gi sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes/ /sngon chad sangs

rgyas drung dag du/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/ /sku'i rgya mtsho mang po dag /rgya mtsho yongasu kun btang zhing / /

spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de/ /rgya mtsho'-i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs/ /snyan dang shang mang rgya mtsho dang / /phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te/ /rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing / /zhing gi rgya
mtsho yongs su sbyangs/ /zhing rnams so so re re la/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /byang chub spyod pa rab spyod de/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi/ /spyod pa
rgya mtsho kun spyad nas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od

snang bas/ /sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong / /byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams/ /dri med 'od can kun kyang mthong / /sangs rgyas kun gyi
byin rlabs kyis/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams/ /de ltar bdag gis sbyang bar bya/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen
pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par
khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni snang bar byed/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni rab tu brjod/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgrog /sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni shin tu brjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni shin tu ston/ snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon
par 'tshang rgya ba'i rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rab tu brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa ni shin tu brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas
rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni rab

tu ston/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam ni mngon par bsgrub pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongasu 'dzin du btsud do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs
su bcad de gsungs pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa/ /gzi brjid chen po legaso legs/ /bsod nams snying po grags pa che/ /snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non/ /chos

kyi dbyings ni khyab byas shing / /bsod nams chen po'i sprin ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho gyur/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing / /nga yi ye shes ji lta bur/ /
khyod kyi mthong ba de ltar 'gyur/ /tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni/ /brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te/ /brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i rnams/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed/ /thams cad

rdul la 'jug tshul du/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams/ /de la 'di 'drar rab tu 'gyur/ /sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad cing / /
'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thugs pa/ /rgyal ba re re mchod byed kyang / /gang gi sems la skyo med na/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs
par 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun/ /khyod kyi smon lam dbang gis bstsal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams ni/ /khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam
dag /mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la/ /blo chen gang rnams 'jugs pa na/ /de dag tshul 'di gnas par 'gyur/ /de la mchod pa byas pas kyang / /gzi brjid chen po stobs chen gyis/ /sems can ri

rab rdul mnyam par/ /byang chub yongasu smin par byas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing / /zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bskal pa rgya chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed gcig byung ste/ de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe yang bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/

rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri/ ri rab dpal gyi spyan de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to/ /de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol

tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po'i rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan

bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo/ /

ye shes rgya chen po byin gyis rlabs dang chos kyi glong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo/ /kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /dmigs pa'i

sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyis rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /

chos kyi rang bzhin namakha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongasu dag pa'i lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /

tshogs pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i glong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i

yang dag par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba yang rab tu thob bo/ /de dag la stsogs pa chos kyi sgo stong
phrag bcu kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bskal pa bye ba
bsam gyis mi khyab du/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i dam pa shin tu dkon/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob par thob/ /de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong / /sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams
rab bkye ba/ /kha dog mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam par dag /'od zer spyan gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab/ /kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed/ /'od kyi rig pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye/ /'gro ba de dag
kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /phun tshun srid zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong / /sprul pa'i sprin rnams bsam mi khyab/ /rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra

ba 'gyed/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas/ /dbyangs sprin bkye bas namakha' kun bkang zhing / /mun
nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po ni/ /sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams/ /thams

cad dbyangs kyi kun tu sgra yang sgrog /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ /mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung / /de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor
lo bskor/ /sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul/ /tshad med rnam par 'phrul pa dag la ltos/ /zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs/ /de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med/ /

sems can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas/ /dga' zhing mos par kun kyang 'ong bar gyis/ /bde ba'i yid dang srid zhu spro ba yis/ /bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de mthong sdug bsngal tha~Ms
cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing / /'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems gyur te/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing / /chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya/ /

sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i sgra la thog pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/ de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur

to/ /de nas pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas namakha' thams cad kun nas
yog par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po brgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin

dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to/ /des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pas 'byung

ba rab tu skyes so/ /ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya bar
yang zhugs par gyur to/ /zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor

bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rjes su rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su

rtog par gyur to/ /'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /rang 'byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyis dbang skur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho

la yang zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to/ /smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa rgya mtsho'i snying po'i
smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal pos/ byang chub sems
dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ legaso yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas/ /sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa/ /
rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung / /chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i/ /bsam gyis myi
khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'i/ /ye shes su yang mi zad non par gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul/ /grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas

par byed/ /gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang / /tha dad yang dag shes tshul mi zad dang / /spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas/ /gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro/ /ting nge
'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur/ /smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te/ /rnam 'phrul 'di langs shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab/ /chos dbyings dam pa

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par blta bar gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs/ /nga'i byang chub spyod la 'jug par

gyis/ /sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi/ /spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa/ /de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyi shes par gyis/ /zhing rnams re rer sangs rgyas mang po ngas/ /rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu

mchod pa byas/ /sngon spyod de yi 'bras bu 'di yin to/ /'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos/ /las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang / /smon lam bsam
yas go ca bgos pas na/ /'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing / /zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas/ /bskal pa 'byam klas kun

tu sbyangs byas shing / /rgyal ba yon tan rin chen mnga' bar 'gyur/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas blta na dga' ba
shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to/ /nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i

me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyi mi non pa zhes bya ba gsum pa byung bar gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya
ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ma thob nas/ 'khor thams cad dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs dang / rin po che bdun dang / grong gi myi dang yul mir bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyi mi non pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi

snying po zhes bya ba phul lo/ /der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu blta ba'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par gyur to/ /des thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/ bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
rab tu thob po/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob nas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyi mi non pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/
yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can/ /byang chub mchog gi smon lam yid ldan pa/ /'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis/ /nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legaso legs/ /snying rje'-i snying po khyod
ni sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa kun tu grol zhugs pas/ /'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
brtan pa rnams/ /skyo med yid kyis spyad pa spyod pa dag /mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa/ /ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi/ /mthu chen
smon lam spyod par zhugs pa ni/ /bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/ /bsod nams 'byung gnas mchog kyang yin/ /bsam gyis myi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag /mtha' dang
dbus med pa ni khyod kyi shes/ /mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas/ /de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtog par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyal ba'i

sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu thos/ /de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang / /sngon chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong / /'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing / /ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur

pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing / /thams cad gzigs par gdon myi za bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni zhing kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa rab spyod nas/ /rgyal ba kun

gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams/ /bslabs nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ongs/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/ /khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par
dag 'gyur te/ /smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur/ /'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang / /khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis/ /
byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /mtha' dbus myed zhing rnam 'byam klas par/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang / /smon lam rnams
kyang yongasu rdzogs par gyis/ /nags tshal chen po'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po

gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas/ rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas shes bya bar phyin te/ der bsod nams dri ma myed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to/ /de
nas lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/ rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal
gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo / /der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis/ tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par ston to/ /des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po/ /
chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga cad
ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par
snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun tu bzang pos tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar
'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongs su 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan
cig spyod pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni
gnas kyi dam pa/ 'tshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ grong rdal ni mdzod mtha' yas

pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
rang bzhin chos kyi gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa'i phyag gis mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang /
gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang / nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyibasu 'dug pa
