sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lag mthil gyi snying po la
rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gi yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas kyi rgya mtsho

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul

dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o/ /snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rnam par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba ste zur dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi brla dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems

can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs can

mtsho rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi

mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub kyi lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho

rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi myig dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyen gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi

dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhing rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skra dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

bdud 'dul ba dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

mdog dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi ro rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o/ /
sems can yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sa kun nas yog par khebs pa'o/ /'jig

rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas bres pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun tu khengs par bkang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni kha dog gi chu rgya

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang

lce dang yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re res nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me tog
ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon te/ me tog ud pa la de dag re re dang /
me tog pun da ri ka de dag re re la'ang me tog ud pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog pun da ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang
ldan pa ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / me tog pun da ri ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par
byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par 'thon pa sha stag go/ /ci'i

phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la/ kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de dag du sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ba 'am khrus byas pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba'i 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am phyi'i 'am/ che ba'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am ngan pa'am rgyang ring po'am thag nye
ba 'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la/ kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya
ste/ de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir myig gi chu rgya mtsho la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de
dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed dag na gzugs su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am che ba 'am chung ba 'am bzang ba 'am ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po'am

thag nye ba 'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad snang bar rang rang gis myig dang / gzhan gyi myig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya
ba ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par btsal bar byas pa'i lus can no/ /chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang
bar 'byung ba'o/ /ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la/
rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba snying

po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa

zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i dbyangs rgya mtshos mtshams yongs su tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na mye'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu

gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho

rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na me tog mtsham ma med pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho tsam gyi tha gru dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil
gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na yon tan ji snyed yod
pa'i yon tan de snyed ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su
'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho sgo mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po khri 'phang du 'dug pa 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang
myed de der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmyigs pa med pa'i/ dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni de ltar de dag las sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dang
ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams ri
rab kun tu bzang po de na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'-i

'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnaM par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha
ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so/ /
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi
rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems
can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa med do/ /skye gnas tha dad pa med do theg pa tha dad pa med do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa der sems can
gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gi 'jigs pa med/ theg pa dma' bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ ser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung
ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrugs par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal
bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'ang med pas/ de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa ni yon tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed
kyi yon tan ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na stong gnyis kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /
rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu mi rtogs kyi gnas thams cad phu dud du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /rtag tu bdud kyi las thams
cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi
sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
gnas pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes
bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po/ 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag las
sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do/ /stong gnyis gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa
zhes bya ba de na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par
gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems

can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson
'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas
pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs chos kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ /ci'i phyir zhe na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khams
rgya mtsho dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag las sogs pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi
khams kun tu spyod pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni stong gi
'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yod do/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su
'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas dam

pa zhes bya ba de ni snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang

seng ge'i khri rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri brgyan de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par bsgrub pa'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ /
ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na/ sems
can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog tu bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas
kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag las sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/

mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yod do/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de ni rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun tu khyab pa/

chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur

pa de dag thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan snying po byang chub kyi rgyan kyi dam par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa theg pa tha dad pas
'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/ mkhas pas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go/ /ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na/
byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag las sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal
mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan de dag ni gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na yod do/ /gling byang
chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
yongs su bskor ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
yongs su gang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu ta dang pun da
ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'i/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rin po ches shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las brtsegs pa/ sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang gi phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rnam par phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par

snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ skad cig cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su mya ngan

las zla ba 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go/ /ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas
pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rlung gi khams kyis rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ nam
mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma gzhag
pa de lta bu gang yang med pas de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag las sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha'
yas pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do/ /
grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na/ nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed yod do/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad sdug pa las yongs su skyab pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi lam dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bstsal ba dang ldan
pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o/ /rang
bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ /dri ma med cing yongasu dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal

mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgreng ba'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yongs su gang ba'o/ /rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ud pa la dang pad mo dang pun da ri ka 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu
thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa

sha stag go/ /ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la/ mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /de dag la sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral

ba de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do/ /

bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa khang pa brtsegs pa

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs

kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu

yi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes 'dong ba'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa kun
nas smad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprul pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rnam par bsgrub pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu bsgrubs pa

gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi/ sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go/ /ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa

zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar

de dag las sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi

yon tan ni bza' shing gi rab kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do/ /de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i

khri'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar

byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rang sangs rgyas

kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyis 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen

po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs

so/ /rnam par spyod do byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas/ myi dang myi ma yin gyi 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba de dag las

byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor

dang ldan pa rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos 'das pa dang

ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul/ /shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha

ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor gyi gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya

mtsho de dag nas myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las sems dpa' re re dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam

pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag te/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed de dag las lus re re la yang / mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba

dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod

pa de dag las dbang po re re la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid

kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam

par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam pa shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa

tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed

cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang de bzhin lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang

dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la 'ang shes par bya ste/ ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes

par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang myi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig

yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed

cig yod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas

par 'gengs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan
cing brjod kyang zad par mi rung ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ bcom ldan

'das ye shes gangs can mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o/ /'od zer rgya mtsho de dag

re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas
kyang yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon to/ /de dag las yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs

su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re re la byang chub sems

dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /

myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su bskul bar byed do/ /shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang de bzhin

te de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dag myi dang myi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyi yang dag par

bskul nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag nas/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te/ gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang myi dang myi ma yin pa rgya

mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying

po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las byang chub sems

dpa' re re dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang / lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya

mtsho de dag dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas de bzhin

du mar me dang / spos dang bdug spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/ lce re re zhing

yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mngon par bstod nas/ rang rang gi stobs dang rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to/ /

'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu ba byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par

snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / myi dang
myi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o/ /rnam par bkrol lo/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par
bstan to/ /de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi
snying po zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ thog mar yang dge bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang
dge ba'i chos don bzang po/ yi ge bzang po dag pa yongs su gsal ba/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho

ji snyed cig mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can

yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye

ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te/ bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na 'khor los

bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang myi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin

chen mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang /

de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang ljags dang sku dang thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho

dang / thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam

mkha'i mthas klo ba'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang

bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha' rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang zla ba'i

cha zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi ral gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi ltar myi mthong ba'i spyi tsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro

ba'i lham rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhags pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos gangs chen mtsho thams cad kyi klong dang ldan pa'i

gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar de dag las sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de rin po che rgya

mtsho de dag la rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po

che mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang myi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brtsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa/ sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar

'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang byang

chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud myed rin po che dang 'dra bar yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems bla na myed pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa/
bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can/ shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi myig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa

chen po yang dag par blangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/

byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su bsgrubs pas myi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa

dang ldan pa chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad yongs su bstsal ba'i mthar thug pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtog pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi

sta zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel ba rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog

sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par

thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang bar gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu

byugs pa/ dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin

phra ba snyed yod do/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo / /de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang

snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo / /spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed

yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /
sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab

dang ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gi lag na bzung ba de dag thams

cad kyang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /gang gis mtha' la rig pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams dang ye

shes sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang dang stan cig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi seng

ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya

mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /gang gis pang du khyud pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /gang dang chos kyi dbyings su sten par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa dang yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'debs so/ /de nas 'khor los

sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po des yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul
gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing sgribs pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das

de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrog pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag par bskul ba'i
tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ rgyal po rin po che mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po 'di nas nub phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen

mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing mtsho skyong de chos ston to/ /yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to bcom ldan 'das
bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta

ba dang de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen

mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes na 'gro la reg ste rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams/ rgya mtsho de

bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni 'gro bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan

par ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ma gtog par/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra

ba snyed la rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag du bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtshams bzang po dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /de khyod kyis

sngan bcad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am ring / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig bzhugs shing mtsho

skyong ba dang / chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba'am 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na

mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa ni smos su 'ang ma mchis te/

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sngon tshe bdag gi ma thos so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos

ston pa legs par soms shig /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du yongasu gzhon pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho las stsogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring ba dang / de na da ltar de

bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma rtsam yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya
mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ring ngam nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi

don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de lta bas na rgyal po rnam grangs des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i

phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ma gtogs par/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba 'am bsnyen bkur ba 'am de las chos
mnyan pa bde blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das bstan tu gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ji srid cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang

zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa bstan du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khams 'di nub phyogs logs kyi sa 'tshams kyi mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams klong gi rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa 'tshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang myi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gangs

chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo chos ston to/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya rgya mtsho de ma shes ma
mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bsamaso/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de de ltar nye na 'ang bdag la mthu'i khyed par myed na/ de bas ring ba lta ci smos snyam nas/ de ltar rjes su bsams
te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu sgrib pa myed pa las sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhags go/ /de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis rlabs pa

mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa 'tshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang
de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa/ rgya mtsho las sogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rab tu shes so/ /dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhags pa'am/ me long shin tu bstsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la ngo snang ba bzhin no/ /des rgyal po
rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang de la phyag
bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen

mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra

ba snyed 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang / bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los bsgyur

ba'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los

bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni
stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los

bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor

los bsgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni gling cig gi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig /gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur

ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig /khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho re re zhing ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar chas pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra

ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/ lha'i zhal snga nas gsan du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de

bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal du lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar gsol lo/ /de skad

ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar khyod sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi

gnyer/ chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa ni tshor bar myi byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni don du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni tshol bar myi byed/ sangs rgyas

kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa myed/

yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni bgrod par 'dod pa myed la/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod
chags dang bcas pa'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang myi gnas/ sems can thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug

cing / spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam yang dag pa'i ye shes la myi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshigs rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo zhe na deng la rag go/ /'khor los

bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re res kyang myig gi khams re res chos kyi

dbyings thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rgya mtsho la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /rna ba'i khams
re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /sna'i khams re

res kyang cig la brten pa'i sa rgya mtsho las sogs pa rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes

su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho las sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho
la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho las stsogs pa

stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob po/ /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'-i

tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas/ spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
byas te/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis/ /'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho chos
ma thos/ /sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob par gyur/ /da ni sangs rgyas phrin las bsgrub pa yin/ /sa mang rgya mtsho'i myig kyang thob par gyur/ /byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su/ /

rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi/ /sna yi khams kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste/ /rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur/ /lce'i kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob/ /des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor
par gyur/ /lus kyi sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na/ /sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrubs par bgyi/ /yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho rnams/ /'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par
bgyi/ le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bco lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das thog

ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+ha'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa/ myig gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa chos mtshan nyid myed pa la shin tu gzhol
ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mnyam pa nyid brnyes bsgrib pa myed pas rtogs pa thugs su chud pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrogs pa myed pa/
rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid las shin tu byung ba/ pho brang kun tu 'ong na seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang skye ba cig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa/ sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa/ 'jig rten
gyi khams la spyod pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la spyod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la spyod pa/ bsam pa'i rgyud la spyod pa/ don dang yi ge la dpyod pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las
'das pa la spyod pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la spyod pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di
snyams du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs

rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung /

sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan
yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bkod pa
bcu ji ltar rnam par dgod pa de ltar yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i tshad myed pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung
byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems pa'i smon lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung /
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su
bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung myi gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa myed par bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa tha~Ms

cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / the tsom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / nem nur thams cad shin tu bstsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa
bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi bsnyengs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul

bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung gong

du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung

gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu

mchog gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog par thugs kyi thugs su chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul

mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol
kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i reg byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad mo'i
snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kha dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su rten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par
sprul te skyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do/ /nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i

mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings myed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig
tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub phyogs su rten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas
nas 'khod do/ /byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba na de bzhin
gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpar rin chen dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan

'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te byang phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do byang shar gyi
phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs
mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa reg byed mtha' brgal

gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /
lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig byed

dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /nub byang
gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig byed
dbang phyug gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas
nas 'khod do/ /'og gis phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog de bzhin gshegs pa rig
