zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla re dang / /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de

dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer pad mo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /pad mo'i rgyan dang pad mo'i bla re dang / /pad ma'i sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /

'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /phreng ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer rgyal mtshan
mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing / /de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis/ /rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed/ /de dag bde gshegs dbu
la gdugs kyis mchod/ /rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa/ /dar gyi lda ldi ba dan yongs sbyangs shing / /dril phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin par byed/ /lag pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i/ /mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar/ /ma lus rgyan pa rnams la'ang de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis/ /rnam par
'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing / /bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du/ /thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed/ /la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa
bsam gyis mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo/ /bzod pa myi zad mi sgul sgo dag dang / /la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo/ /bsam gtan rab tu zhi
gnas sgo dag dang / /don dam rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo/ /tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol

sgo dag dang / /bsod nams yongs su bstsags dang ye shes sgo/ /bden pa brten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang / /la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo/ /nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang / /rang rgyal
theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo/ /theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang / /la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo/ /
la la zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag tu/ /'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs de/ /de dag kun gyi chos nyid sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can
'dul/ /gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag mtshan mar bzung bar mi nus te/ /ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o/ /de dag dga'
ba'i rgyan gyis ting 'dzin mchog /'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin byed 'thun/ /dga' bde spro bar dga' ba kun ldan pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems can 'dul/ /gang tshe lo nyes
thams cad dkon gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams/ /thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don byed/ /de dag zas mchog skom dang
rgyan mchog dang / /gos dang dga' ba rin chen sna tshogs dang / /rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdugs yongs btang bas/ /sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed/ /de dag mtshan rab kun gyi lus btang
zhing / /gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btang ste/ /phreng bas rnam rgyan spos kyis bskus byas te/ /gzugs rnams yongs su btang bas sems can 'dul/ /mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la/ /
de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzad/ /gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing / /gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang / /ko ki la

kun ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / /rnga dang tshangs pa mi 'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston/ /de dag stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi'o/ /gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /
chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten thams cad 'dul/ /de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ /don dang don myed grogs kyang de bzhin te/ /sems can dgos la grogs
su 'gyur byas shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod pa byed/ /'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /
de dag grogs don mi bde nyams su len/ /gang nas 'byung ba med cing chos med de/ /dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /de dag kun tu rgyal srid che spangs shing / /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon
par 'byung / /de dag khyim gyi brtson ra sred gnas pa'i/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa yongs su brjod/ /de dag
spyod pa bcu rnams brjod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod/ /drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus par/ /yongs su bsgom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed/ /gang na sems can tshad
med che ldan pa/ /bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /de dag kun tu nad gzer nad bu can/ /bdag la dbang med tsam gyi dbang bsgyur ston/ /'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar bar byed/ /
gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten 'bar gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi/ /chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /
sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba brjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyis/ /gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yin che ba ste/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed/ /'jig rten mi
chags tshul la pad mo bzhin/ /dga' ba mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod/ /de dag brjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /mdzes shing sdug par bzhad gad byed

pa dang / /sgyu mkhan gzugs mkhan kun kyang ston par byed/ /grong dang grong dpon kha lo bsgyur ba dang / /ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te/ /rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang / /sman pa
mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed/ /de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang / /lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin
lam ston 'gyur/ /'jig rten byung nas mi shes par gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la smos thabs tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang brjod pa byed/ /

'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams/ /sems can bde bskyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rigs mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs dang / /kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod/ /drang srong rnams
kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dad gyur dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' ba mchog gi rnams/ /kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston par byed/ /de dag rgyud dang kun rgyu mu stegs
can/ /dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang / /sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed/ /de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang / /bla na yod dang bla na
med pa rnams/ /ral pa ring dang byis pa brtul zhugs can/ /de dag du yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i rjes spyad dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod/ /gle'u
can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams/ /de dag kun na'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang / /mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang / /rtsa 'bras chu la
spyod pa'i rnams la ni/ /chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur/ /gnas brteg gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang / /tsher ma rtsab dang thal ba'i mal can dang / /dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod
pa'i rnams/ /de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas nas/ /bsgrub dka' mi zad drag shul dka' thub kyi/ /
mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang pa 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bus 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la zhen pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis/ /bden pa ston pa de
dag kun tu byed/ /la la dra byi lo'i sngags tshig tu/ /shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag la lha'i gsang tshig gis/ /
la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig gis/ /don rnams rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang / /bstan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la mi

skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig des tshig rnams dang / /la la dag la lha'i tshig des tshig dang / /klu yi tshig des gnod sbyin tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang / /dri za
grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig /mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis/ /bden pa brtan cing thar par 'dren pa byed/ /de dag bden pa'i des tshig tshul shes bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos
rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par bsgrub byed cing / /
'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ /'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul/ /'od zer mthong na legs pa rab snyeng zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med
ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas/ /dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te/ /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pa
na/ /des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer grub/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yis/ /'od zer 'od byed rab tu dgyes byas shing / /mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun bstsal te/ /'jig rten phan
pa'i 'od de rab tu snang / /'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin/ /rgyal ba mchod phyir mye mar bzung byas pas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar

'gyur/ /'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang / /shing dang rtsi dang smig ma spa yi sgron/ /spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag /rgyal ba rnam gsol 'od byed de thob bo/ /'od zer sgron zhes bya ba rab
bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /de dag sreg pa rnams yongs srid pa'i mtshor/ /sems can bsgral don go cha brtan par gyon/ /gang rnams sred pa'i rnam yongs srid pa'i mtshor/ /

sems can bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa/ /de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston/ /stegs dang zam pa gcig smin byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru
byin te/ /'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na/ /des ni sgron ma'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer sgom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /'dod pa'i
yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing / /chos kyis rnam grol ro la don du gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs te/ /chos kyis grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas/ /sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa
'bebs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten srid pa'i skom pa rnam par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lu ma dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa rnams smad bsam gtan bsngags pa na/ /

skom pa rnams sel de ni des bsgrub po/ /'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes
sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje mnga' rnams sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na/ /dga' ba byed
pa'i 'od ni des grub bo/ /'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'/ /chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos
pas dga'/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste/ /chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang / /rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob/ /
sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs bcas la/ /sems can mang po bskul zhing dran byas te/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na/ /des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub/ /'od zer bsod
nams bstsags pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong / /de dag mchod sbyin lhug pa byed
pa'i tshe/ /slongs mo pa yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ /bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na/ /des ni 'od zer bsod nams bstsags grub bo/ /'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /
sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes dran nas/ /chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de/ /des
rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pa nas/ /des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer

des bskul ba/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/ /sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos/ /rmi lam lta bu gzugs
rnyan rang bzhin rnams/ /bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub po/ /'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /mi zad gzugs kyi bang mdzod rnams
thob cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'chad rnams la yongs su phan btags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyi bsrung byas shing / /'gro ba kun la chos bzhin phan btags pas/ /
'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul de grub bo/ /'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa'i ji snyed des bskul ba/ /skyid pa mi brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu sbyin
mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jungs pa gdul dka'i sems can ma dul dang / /nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i
'od zer des bsgrub po/ /'od zer yongs su gdung bar rab bkye zhing / /tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed
do/ /dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul zhing / /byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer de grub po/ /
bzod pas rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /khro ba'i tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / /de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig sems
ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing / /bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas/ /des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan des grub po/ /'od zer brtson
dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /le lo'i sems kyi ji snyed des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson zhing
dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te/ /myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob/ /sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul
byas te/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /tha ma'i dus dang dam chos yongs su bzung / /des ni brtson 'grus 'od zer de grub po/ /'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / /rnam 'khrugs sems
can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /nyams su mi gnod mnyam bzhag sems su gyur/ /sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang / /'du 'dzin yongs su rnam
par spangs byas te/ /bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rab bsngags pas/ /des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub po/ /'od zer shes rab rnam rgyan rab bkye zhing / /shes rab 'chal pa ji snyed des bskul pa/ /

bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po'i rgyu la rtog par shes gyur cing / /nyi ma'i 'od zer ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor
dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste/ /byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba/ /de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas/ /shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub po/ /'od zer sangs rgyas ldan
pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang / /pad mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam

thar dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te/ /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub po/ /'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / /
'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa/ /'byung po bza' dang gsad cing bdeg pa dang / /nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu grol/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can skyab pa dang / /srog gcod
las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing / /'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la skyab byas pas/ /'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des grub po/ /'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing / /nad pa na ba
ji snyed des reg pa/ /thams cad las kyi sdug bsngal rnam par grol/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang 'thob/ /nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug

pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom byin pas de grub po/ /'od zer ston pa sangs rgyas rab bkye zhing / /tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas
mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro/ /'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ /dga' 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / /'chi kar sangs rgyas
skyabasu btang byas pas/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob po/ /'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed/ /
chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing / /mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes/ /brjod
pa chos rab rjod pa des thob po/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag /kun kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsal ba'i dbyangs sgrar drang srong cher brjod de/ /rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams/ /'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du/ /yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs
ldan thob/ /'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /bag med spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len/ /
'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang / /'gog pa rtag tu bde ba'i zhi dga' zhes/ /brjod pas gnyis med sbyin pa de thob bo/ /'od zer khyad par ldan
pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang / /shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan/ /tshul khrims 'phags pa
ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste/ /shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes/ /byang chub don du bsngags shing bstod byas pas/ /des ni 'od zer khyab par ldan pa thob/ /'od zer rin chen rnam
brgyan rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /rin chen gter mang mi zad thob gyur te/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /

rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la/ /rin chen sdud de rin chen sbyin btang bas/ /rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /'od zer spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od
zer des bskul ba/ /mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos kyis
rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten dag /byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog /rol mo
sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis/ /pho brang dam pas yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs/ /sngon chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te/ /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
ba dan mchog dag gis/ /mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan grub bo/ /'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing / /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/ /mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams
sbyang byas pas/ /des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub/ /'od zer 'od chen sprin ldan rab bkye zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas/ /mchod rten gam yo spos chus yongs btab pas/ /
'od zer bro mchod ldan pa rab tu thob/ /'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gos dang bgo ba phreng ba sna tshogs dag /yongs su btang bas
lhab lhub rnam rgyan grub/ /'od zer blo mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /bkres pas kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i
'od kyang thob/ /'od zer nor bstan rab tu dgyes byas shing / /phongs pa rin chen gter rnams thob par 'gyur/ /gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum/ /gsol bas nor ston 'od zer de
thob bo/ /'od zer mig sbyong rab tu dgyes byas shing / /long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs 'thob 'gyur/ /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer 'grub/ /

rna ba rnam sbyongs 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam sbyong thob/ /'od zer sna sbyong rab tu bkye

byas shing / /sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /spos zhim gsol bas sna sbyong 'od zer thob/ /lce sbyong 'od zer rab tu bkye byas shing / /sgra snyan

yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas ston/ /mi snyan bslang bar smra ba rnam spangs te/ /'jam par smra bas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /'od zer lus sbyong rab tu bkye byas shing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par
'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /lus kyi rab btud lus sbyong 'od zer thob/ /'od zer sems sbyong rab tu bkye byas shing / /smos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur/ /ting
'dzin rjes su sems 'gror rab byas pas/ /des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub po/ /'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu dkye byas shing / /bsam yas sku mnga'i mi'i dbang po mthong / /sku gzugs ri mor

sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs mthong thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu dkye byas shing / /sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes/ /rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'da'o
zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po/ /'od zer dri sbyong rab tu dkye byas shing / /dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/ /spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /khrus
byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin/ /'od zer mchog ni rab tu dkye byas shing / /dug can dug myed ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /ro mchog thams cad phul
ba'i don de yin/ /'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dkye byas shing / /reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam bder 'gyur/ /tri shul mda' dang ral gri mda' yi char/ /phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 'gyur/ /gos
mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams/ /rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang / /phreng ba bla re gsol bas don de yin/ /'od zer chos sbyong rab
tu dkye byas shing / /ba spu kun nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i/ /bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thob par 'gyur/ /mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed/ /rkyen las byung bas ma skyes
rang bzhin yin/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te/ /chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas shes/ /brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob po/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong

rnams kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig nas/ /gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung / /kun nas tha dad las kyi tshul yin no/ /ji ltar ba spu gcig sgo sgo gcig nas/ 'od zer gang+ga'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba/ /
de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub gyur pa'i// yon tan de la bstan grogs byas pa la/ /rjes su yid rang
gsol ba su btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bstsags gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes/ /gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te/ /sangs rgyas yang dang yang du
mchod byas shing / /sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba/ /de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul/ /dmus long rnams kyi nyi ma'i 'od mthong yang / /de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char/ /mig

dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang / /med pa ma yin kun tu 'phro ba ste/ /de dag mos pa log pas mnar ba yi/ /phal gyis

mi mthong blo gros yongs la mod/ /rgyan dang nor bu bzhon pa gzhal med khang / /rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa rnams/ /de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi/ /nyon mongs phongs pa rnams la yod pa min/ /

gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te/ /dad la yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du/ /mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi skyed/ /de dag 'khor gyi rgyan du rnam 'phrul bas/ /
ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par bsgrub byed cing / /phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi/ /rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa byed/ /de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam/ /'od kyi rnam rgyan
byin gyis rlabs byas shing / /lus gcig bskyil mo krung gi pad+mo de/ /yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad mo gzhal/ /'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis
brlabs byas shing / /rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor / /de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par spyod/ /drang srong des ni yongasu smin byas te/ /rgyal ba'i legs la yongasu gang bsgrub

pa/ /de dag pad mo chen po'-i 'khor byed cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang blta/ /skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste/ /gang rnams ting 'dzin rnam spyod zhugs gyur pa/ /kun kyang rang rang slob mos bslab
'gyur te/ /zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyi bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing / /sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /

ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon bsgrub cing / /phyogs kyi dra bar snrel zhir spyod pa byed/ /la la mnyam bzhag la la nam langs par/ /rang rang lus kyang phyogs

rnams kun tu ston/ /de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing / /dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang / /nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing / /shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang / /de bzhin

phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed de/ /phyogs rnams kun tu mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan nas ldang / /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs zhing grangs ji
snyed yod pa rnams/ /ma lus de dag kun gyi rang byung gi/ spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang / /der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas/ /
nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams/ /yangs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga nas/ /mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang / /nub kyi zhing grangs ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /ma lus de dag kun gyi

sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod pa de dag snang / /der ni mnyam bzhag sems can brtan byas nas/ /shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams/ /langs
shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na/ /mchod pa rnam pa du ma byed par snang / /phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo rnams/ /la la mnyam bzhag
la la rnam par langs/ /'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang / /de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang / /'jig rten lhar bcas mos par
'gyur ba yi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pas mig gi lam las ldang / /mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /
stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba sgra yi lam las ldang / /sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra rnyan bzhin du shes/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de

la mos par 'gyur/ /sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pas rna ba'i lam las ldang / /rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed/ /de dag sna
yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba dri yi lam las ldang / /dri rab mchog la 'jug pa rab tu zhugs/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /dri yi lam la mnyam par
bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa sna yi lam las ldang / /sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag lce yi lam las mnyam bzhag cing / /blo mchog kun
gyi lam las ldang bar byed/ /bdag nyid che ba de dag blo mchog shes/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /bro yi mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa lce yi lam las

ldang / /lce ni ma byung ma skyes rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag lus kyi lam las mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba reg pa'i lam las ldang / /'jig rten bde ba bskyed
pa'i reg la zhugs/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldang / /lus ni ma byung ma skyes rang bzhin te/ /
stong pa byed pa med par ston pa de/ /de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang / /chos sgrub 'jug par bya la rab tu zhugs/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de
la mos par 'gyur/ /chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang / /sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed/ /
byis pa'i lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /gzhon nu dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang / /gzhon nu dar la bab pa mnyam bzhag cing / /rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su rnam par ldang / /rgan zhing
'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge bsnyen ma yi lusu rnam par ldang / /dge bsnyen ma yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang / /dge bsnyen dad
pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong ma yi lusu rnam par ldang / /dge slong ma yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus su ldang / /dge slong mang thos lus la
mnyam bzhag cing / /slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang / /slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam par ldang / /rang rgyal lus las de dag mnyam
bzhag cing / /sangs rgyas sku mchog phul du rnam par ldang / /sangs rgyas sku mchog phul las mnyam bzhag cing / /lha yi lusu de dag rnam par ldang / /lha yi lusu de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /

'phrul chen klu yi lus su rnam par ldang / /'phrul chen klu yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam par ldang / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /'byung po kun

gyi lus su rnam par ldang / /'byung po kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas mnyam bzhag cing / /spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /

spu rtse kun gyi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing / /skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas mnyam bzhag cing / /skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni
mnyam bzhag cing / /rdul phran gcig las de dag rnam par ldang / /rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /rdul phran ma lus kun las rnam par ldang / /rdul phran kun las de dag
mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang / /rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing / /rin chen shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang / /rin chen shing gi 'bras la mnyam

bzhag cing / /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni rnam par ldang / /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo ni mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang / /rgya mtsho chu klung kun nas mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid
che ba me yi lam las ldang / /me yi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /dran dang ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldang / /rlung gi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba sa yi gzhi las ldang / /
sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /lha yi gzhal med khang nas rnam par ldang / /lha yi gzhal med khang du mnyam bzhag cing / /dran dang ldan pa klu yi gnas nas ldang / /yon tan mtha' yas
stsogs pa de dag gis/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam myi khyab/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bskal pa bsam yas su/ /bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par myi rung ngo / /rgyal ba kun gyi de skad ma gsungs myin/ /'gro
ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam myi khyab/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang / /bsam gtan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam myi khyab/ /de dag kun la 'ang dpe bstan brjod par bya/ /de la
'dra ba'i dpe lta yod min te/ /mkhas shing gsal ba'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/ /bstan na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur/ /sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyan gnas pa'i/ /nyan thos gcig tu
gyur cing mang por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur cing de bzhin gcig gyur te/ /nam mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar/ /'og nas me 'bar steng nas chu'i rgyun/ /steng nas me 'bar 'og nas chu'i rgyun/ /
'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te/ /skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam myi khyab/ /de ni snying rje chen po ldan ma yin/ /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog /'on kyang lus 'phrul

bsam gyis myi khyab ston/ /'jig rten phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston/ /nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod zhing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang / /lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya mtsho'i snod/ /
chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston pa byed/ /de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kun kyang / /skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /de
la de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung dpal/ /mtsho gsum dang bar yan lag bzhi yi dpung / /so so rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong / /ral gri shang lang sogs ka mde'u thung mda'/ /

bzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas par mthong / /gang gi gzugs dang cha byad ci 'dra ba/ /chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong / /chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de

'dra'o/ /rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa/ /sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa rnams/ /de sgrog sgra yi yan lag dbyangs tshul shes/ /sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod/ /dbyangs ldan de ni 'dod

chags zhe sdang can/ /'on kyang sgra dbyangs las kyi tshul la mkhas/ /gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob pa/ /'jig rten lhar bcas ci phyir mgur mi byed/ /dga' byed chung ma sgra brnyan ldan pa mo/ /
tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste/ /dam tshig bden bsgrub mi 'tshe dga' ba yin/ /sems yid dag rnams byin gyis rlob pa byed/ /sgra snyan ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can/ /brtul
zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang / /'jig rten yid 'ong sgras kyang tshim par byed/ /ye shes yon tan mang ba cir mi ston/ /sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma mkhan po yang / /sna tshogs mtha'
yas gzugs mang ston pa byed/ /nyi mtshan yid dang zla ba lo brgya dang / /khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/ /'dod chags zhe sdang ldan pa'i mkhan po yang / /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig
rten dga' bar byed/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab byang ba/ /spyod pa tshul mkhas ci phyir dga' mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/ /lha min lha yang rung ste gang pham pa/ /
de dag gzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par/ /go ca gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer/ /lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis myi khyab ston/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul

gnas pa'i dpa' bo rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa/ /'phrul chen lha yi dbang po 'khor gyur pa/ /mgo mang sum bcu rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed/ /
mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /so rnams re re kun la'ang me chab rnams/ /bdun dang bdun bcus rgyas yangs sprul pa byed/ /rdzing rnams re re kun tu pad mo rnams/ /bdun bdun rgyas kyi
rnam brgyan sprul pa byed/ /pad mo rer yang lha yi bu mo dag /sgyu brtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/ /

glang po de yang glang po'i lus btang zhing / /lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun dang mthun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ltos/ /de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang

gti mug can/ /'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang gyur zhes/ /ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci phyir 'phrul mi byed/ /sgra can ci dga'i tshul dang lus rdzu na/ /

rdo rje gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor ni/ /rgya mtsho'i zabs ring lta bar phyin tsam byed/ /ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom/ /de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/ /'on kyang de 'dra rdzu 'phrul ston
byed na/ /'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams yongs 'dul ba/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul pa'ang ltos shig dang / /lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur

pa'i tshe/ /lha min bye ba mchis pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed/ /lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang bas
gzung gyur ces/ /lha min dbang pos kun kyang mgo rmongs so/ /'jig pa'i gzugs kyis mig stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar ba rab bzo shing / /lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i/
brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang por 'byer/ /de ni bsod nams phal gyi stobs dang mthus/ /lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i/ /bsod nams
mi zad rnams go cir mi 'phrul/ /lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yod pa/ /lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung / /lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas/ /mkha' las rnga yi

dbyangs kyis rab tu sgrog /'dod pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan te/ /'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos/ /bag med thams cad
gtsugs lngan mya ngan ldan/ /tshems kyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin/ /ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa rnams/ /bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin/ /yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug bsngal
rtsa/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyi smad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad mthar zad rang bzhin gyis/ /chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul

byas nas/ /kun kyang chos bzang 'dun sar dong phyin te/ /lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams/ /'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa brjod/ /rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang / /don chen rnga yi

sgra ni sgrog byed na/ /bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen cir myi byed/ /lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe/ /lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/ /
lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yi mchog /lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog /rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga' ba ste/ /'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur/ /
lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngangs gyur nas/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byer/ /de bzhin ji 'dra 'chi med stobs pa'i rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung gyur te/ /bdud dang nyon mongs

bcom pa'i snying rje can/ /zhi ba'i sgra sgrog nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig dang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes/ /
gcig ltas lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ /lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang / /chos bzangs 'dun du kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug /lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang / /brgya byin skad
cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul/ /brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/ /sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/ /'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig

rten dgar mi byed/ /bdud kyi bkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang bsgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong / /las dang nyon mongs kun tu khri zhags kyis/ /so so'i skye bo bdun 'khrug des kyang bcing / /
de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcad/ /'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na/ /dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rab ste/ /'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog /stong gsum bdag

po tshangs pa chen po yang / /stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams dang / /ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrogs/ /de ni 'jig rten pa yi lam
gyis ni/ /bsam gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul/ /'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul/ /dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos/ /
rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi char rnams rab bkye ba/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad bgrang ba byed/ /thigs dga'i zer kyang ma lus de shes na/ /bskal pa bsam gyis myi khyab tshul bslabs te/ /sangs
rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams/ /cis rab 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ /skad cig gcig la sems bsam shes mi 'gyur/ /sems can las smin bsam gyis myi khyab pas/ /rlung dang

'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung / /rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang / /sa bon rnam mang kun kyang de las byung / /rlung las sprin byung char pa kun tu 'bab/ /sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis
'gyur/ /lo tog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te/ /'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba bskyed/ /de ni pha rol phyin la ma bslabs te/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslabs min na 'ang / /'jig rten rnam

grub bsam yas ston byed na/ /rang nyams thob pa cis rab ston mi byed/ /rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i chu yi tshogs rnams ni/ /bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dgas skad/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad/ /thams
cad skad bzhin 'gro la rnam par sgrog /de bzhin sgra rnyan rang bzhin sgra shes nas/ /sgrib pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas/ /'gro ba kun tu sgra rnyan brjod byas shing / /'jig rten thams cad yid
'ong sgras tshim byed/ /rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing / /chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi zad/ /chu rnams bzung bas yongasu ngoms pa
med/ /de bzhin de dag 'gro kun brgyar stsal te/ /bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes/ /shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun/ /bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyi ngoms pa

med/ /rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse byed na/ /sa yi gzhi nas dbang bsgyur gnas kyi bar/ /gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs/ /de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan/ /de ni dbang bsgyur
gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi/ gser gyi mdog du sprin mang rnam par bsgrubs/ /'phrul dga' mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/ /dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /mtshe mar mthon
ting bai DUR+Ya yi mdog /sum bcu gsum du a sma gar b+ha 'dra/ /rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/ /rdo rje mi phyed sra mchog rgya mtshor ro/ /mi yi gnas su dad pa spos mchog 'dres
par te/ /klu yi gnas su pad mo'i mdog lta bu/ /gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog /ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su'o/ /byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston te/ /gling rnams
gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan du ston/ /'dzam bu'i gling du ri gnag 'dra bar te/ /sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin/ /dbang bsgyur gnas su gser gyi sprin bstan nas/ /
nyi ma'i mdog 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'phrul dga'i gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang / /dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston/ /kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te/ /
sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog du/ /rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor re/ /mi ci gnas su mthon bting bai DUR+Ya/ /klu yi gnasu
dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste/ /a sma'i mdog du lha min mdog du'o/ /byang du ngang gi snang ba'i rin chen mdog /gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan

dang gzhan/ /'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an+d+ra rnyil/ /sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul mthun klog kyang 'gyed/ /de ni tshangs pa'i dbang bsgyur gnasu tshangs dbyangasu/ /'brug sgra sgrogs byed 'phrul dga'i rnga yi dbyangs/ /
rol mo'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste/ /lha mo dbyangasu mtshe ma dag tu'o/ /sum bcu gsum du mi'am ci'i skad du ste/ /rgyal chen gnasu dri za'i skad du'o/ /ri 'thab dbyangs su rgya mtsho
kun tu ste/ /mi 'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sgra/ /klu yi gnasu thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra/ /gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'-i sgra/ /lha min gnasu lha rdzas rnga yi sgra/ /rgya mtsho'i shugs sgrar
mi yi gnas su'o/ /dbang bsgyur gnas su lha rdzas gsung zhim pa'i/ /me tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs/ /zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar ste/ me tog man 'da' ra ba'i

phreng ba'i char 'bebaso/ /dga' ldan gnas su rin chen chen po'i char/ /rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang / /gser 'od bzang po'-i char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /
rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang / /phreng ba byug pa rgyan gyi dam pa dang / /mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog du/ /rol mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs/ /sum bcu gsum du

rin chen sna tshogs te/ /tsan dan dam pa'i spos dang a ga ru/ /gur gum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la/ /spos chu'i rgyan dang me tog 'dres par 'bab/ /nyam du 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams/ /kha dog dri

zhim ro dang ldan pa dang / /de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun tu yang / /char rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa gnya' shing tsam/ /

mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun tu 'bab/ /mi ci'i gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs dang / /pad mo ut+pal dngos dang rin chen dang / /me tog par shi ma la'i phye ma

spos/ /pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro/ /klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste/ /gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dang gnang ba/ /lha min gnasu ral gri mde'u thung mdung / /dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ke'i

char 'bebaso/ /byang du de ni phreng ba rin chen dang / /me tog par shi ma li tsam pa ka'i/ /phreng ba bzang po kun ran mug ta ka /gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'dang
rab stsal gyi/ /char rnams sna tshogs shin tu phra bar 'bebs/ /me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing / /kha zas de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phral byed/ /de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis myi khyab
dang / /glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnams byed kyang / /khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ /klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar chu yis rgya mtshor gnas pa yang / /
klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag /mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang por cir mi ston/ /dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam/ /

skyes bu de dag de ltar brjod byas te/ /dpa' bo de dag dpe dang rnam par bral/ /de dag de 'dra'i rnam par dbang bsgyur ro/ /mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can/ /ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can/ /

ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i/ /rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad/ /gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas/ /yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni/ /ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos dang de ldan te/ /
mi yis yul na de ni dka' ba byed/ /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed na/ /so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon/ /dge bstsags bsod nams byas pa de dag ni/ /rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid
ches 'gyur/ /gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i/ /mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste/ /de bas rang rgyal theg la dad pa dkon/ /theg chen dad byed de bas shin tu dkon/ /theg chen

'di la zhugs pa med pa ste/ /'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon/ /'dzin cing spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te/ /yang dag ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos/ /la la stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /bskal
par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang / /'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa byed pa lags/ /de 'dra dka' bar rtsi ba ma yin no/ /la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par
bsnyen bkur na'ang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /bsod nams ci 'dra thob pa de la min/ /la la zhing bcu ri dang mtsho bcas pa/ /lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang / /

'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad
byed pa'i/ /bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /bskal pa bde ba kun gyis bsnyen bkur te/ /la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas na/ /bsod
nams 'di ni de las khyed par 'phags/ /rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par 'gyur/ /lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan/ /
'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/ /thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te/ /phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang mdog pa/ /bzang po dpal
gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur/ /phyag gi mthil gyi mgo la byug mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de dag gsung brjod pa/ /rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyi legs par bshad/ /legs par bshad pa rjes
su ngad bgyis so/ /bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'-i mdo/ bam po bcu dgu pa/
de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i
phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gling bzhi pa
'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis chos

ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par so so nas shes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma brtul bar byang chub kyi shing gi drung du ri rab kyi rtse mo'i

lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba ga la ba der gshegs par snang ngo / /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang te/ byin gyis rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam

par rgyal ba'i khang pa logasu mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin seng ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i

snying po can pog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla res bres pa/ gdugs stong phrag cus shin tu bzung ba/ dar gyi lda ld-i stong
phrag bcus rab tu spyangs pa/ mu tig gi se mo do stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag

bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'od zer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so/ /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po khang pa rnam par rgyal bar
lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag du 'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bcas nas/ zhe sa dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs pas zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal
ba'i khang par gshegaso/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag du'ang gshegs par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin

gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa thams cad du glu dang rol mo dang / sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste/ zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma
dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes
pa/ /rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /gser thub sgrib pa med par rab tu gz-igs pa de/ /
rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ /rtse mo
mchog du gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/ /mdzod spu'i rtse mor
gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gtor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa/ /rin chen sna tshogs gshegs
gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon/ /rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir
yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brten pa de/ /ma la ya'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs
gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ /dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis
dam pa gang zhig gis/ /grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i bla/ /dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po
mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de/ /'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba gshegs pa glur blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan
gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas
te bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs par snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma

thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang / sum bcu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad na'ang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtser gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ bcwo brgyad pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par

gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems

dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig tu phyin par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang / thams cad blo gros dang /

dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dag go/ /byang chub sems

dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa te/ 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang / pad mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ud pa la'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i me tog

dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog dang / ldum bu'i me tog dang / namakha'i me tog dag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes

bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma nyams pa dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi sgul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med pa dang / zla ba'i
'od zer dang / zla ba rdul med pa dang / zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur

rgyas par bkang nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas bskyil mo bkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri

rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming

de skad ces bya ba sha stag go/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring nas tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig stong bkye ste/ phyogs bcur thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang stan to/ /byang chub sems

dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar

gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /snang ba dri ma med la ltos/ /ri rab rtse mo
thams cad la/ /mgon po dag ni rab tu snang / /rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs/ /lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ /spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gi/ rab
tu gshegs pas mngon par bstod/ /kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags/ /phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing / /yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod/ /kun gyi ming yang
'di nyid de/ /ji ltar des la btags pa bzhin/ /'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang / /de skad gnas nas kun kyang 'ongs/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /drang srong chen po'i mtshan

kyang de/ /de na tshangs spyod bla med la/ /the tsom med par de dag spyod/ /kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig /drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na/ /rgyal ba 'di na
bzhugs snyams byed/ /bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyams du/ /ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam/ /'jig rten khams ni kun na yang / /sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re che/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams

cad na/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing / /de dag smon lam 'di btab ste/ /byang chub spyod pa rab tu spyod/ /kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod byed kyang / /chos kyi dbyings la
mi chags te/ /de dag sus kyang mi shes so/ /gang gis 'jig rten mun bstsal zhing / /thams cad dus su rnam snang ba/ /de la 'dra ba gang yang med/ /de ni shes par ji ltar rung / /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dren pa rnams ni mthong nas kyang / /bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te/ /'jig rten
mgon skyob de dag gis/ /chos nyid de ni shes pa min/ /mtshan ma dag la spyod pa rnams/ /gti mug dra ba 'phel bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba/ /'khor ba'i brtson rar mdongs pa yin/ /

chos rnams 'di dag brtag byas na/ /rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste/ /skye dang shi 'phos gyur pa rnams/ /ming tsam du ni stan pa yin/ /chos rnams gang yang 'gro ba med/ /gang yang de bzhin skye ba med/ /

chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na/ /sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang / /gzung du med cing bltar med cing / /chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med/ /dngos med pa yi mtha' shes na/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tshad kyang med/ /
tshad med pa yi chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa/ /de ni ci zhig yod ces par/ /mthong bar gyur pa gang yang med/ /gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag byis pa'i chos
nyid de/ /de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo / /dus gsum 'byung ba'i thub pa rnams/ /mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste/ /mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa ste/ /chos kyi
dbyings la g.yo ba med/ /la la dag gis chos nyid shes/ /la la dag ni chos kyang brjod/ /gang la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid 'di/ /
chos kyi blo gros 'di brjod do/ /de thos nas kyang bdag cag gis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs
bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i/ /ye shes shes rab shin tu che/ /de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs/ /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam
mi khyab/ /tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis/ /byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas/ /de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo / /shes rab chung ba thams cad ni/ /phung po'i
'du shes rnams la gnas/ /phung po rnam par ma sgoms pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo / /dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni/ /bdag gi dngos shes bya ba yin/ /chos rnams thams cad shes gyis

shing / /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos/ /sngon chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba/ /ma 'ongs pa'i tshul shes pas/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ /ji ltar snang ba

med pa yi/ /mun pa'i nang na gzugs mi snang / /de bzhin chos rnams bshad pa ni/ /mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo / /ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis/ /gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin sems ni

ma sbyangs pas/ /sangs rgyas chos ni mithong ngo / /ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa/ /rab rib can gyi mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin phug na gnas sems kyis/ /sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo / /de bas mig ni rnam par sbyong /

gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/ /chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis/ /'od mdzad rab tu mthong ma yin/ /ji ltar sngon blos kun bshad cing / /bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub kyi
snyams pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /

gnas med pa yi chos rnams la/ /gnas ni yongs su brtags pas ni/ /de phyir srid pa'i brtson ra na/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor/ /brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos/ /blo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags/ /de ni yongasu

bsgribs byas pas/ /bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byas/ /shes rab chung la lam nor cing / /bdag gis sems la mi mkhas pa/ /phyin ci log gi blo dag gis/ /mi zad lus ni 'phrel bar byed/ /gang gis stong pa ma

mthong ba/ /de dag 'khor zhing nyams yang nga / /chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mig kyang de la yod pa min/ /de bas mig ni sbyang bar gyis/ /bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par sems/ /gang phyir bdag cag sngon

cad du/ /bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na/ /mig kyang yod pa chags med pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas ces byung ba'i/ /chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong / /gang gis shes rab che

mnga' ba/ /chos su bde gshegs mthong ba rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten mig can te/ /gang gi mthong ba mthong zhes bya/ /lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni/ /chos rnams ngan par ma mthong ste/ /lhag mthong gis ni mthong

gyur na/ /thams cad mthong ba med pa yin/ /kye ma chos kyis chos nyid ni/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi bshad/ /de ni rang bzhin thams cad du/ /shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba/ /

dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te/ /de las bdag gis thos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yi/ /mig ni shin tu 'khrug pa yin/ /'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste/ /sangs rgyas la ni log mi mnga'/ /gang gis log par shes gyur te/ /yang dag ji

bzhin ma nor la/ /yang dag ma nor yin shes na/ /sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin/ /mthong ba dag gis dri med 'gyur/ /rnam par mthong na de med de/ /sangs rgyas rnams nis thong dang bral/ /de bas rnam dag

gzigs shes bya/ /de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste/ /'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags/ /'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na/ /snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnams kyi snang ba ni/ /'jig rten mtshan nyid

snang ba ste/ /yang dag ji bzhin mnyam byas shing / /de ltar mthong na mthong ba'o/ /de ltar mthong ba nyon mongs med/ /dbang du gyur cing zag pa med/ /gang gis tha dad med mthong ba/ /dngos por brtags pa

ma yin no/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste/ /de dag yod pa ma yin pas/ /rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin/ /de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag /nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid

med/ /de dag la ni ston pa med/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos/ /chos rnams la ni mos byed de/ /chos kyi 'du shes rnam bsgoms shing / /shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa/ /des ni thub chen mthong ba yin/ /

ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa/ /de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong / /de mthong bas na 'du byed kun/ /rang bzhin gyis kyang rnam par zhi/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi
rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma sangs rgyas dpal chen rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do/ /rnam grol thugs ni sdigs mi mnga'/ /
'jig rten mthar phyin brgal ba po/ /yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar/ /bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas/ /ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin/ /'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs/ /'du byed thams cad

skad cig ma/ /so so skye bo de dag 'gengs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gzung byas shing / /de dag de phyir khom pa med/ /khom pa med ces bya ba ni/ /ci yang brjod pa med pa ste/ /khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /khom pa

bsam gyi myi khyab thob/ /gang la dngos po med pa yi/ /mi zad khom pa med par bshad/ /yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na/ /des ni grags chen mthong ba yin/ /mthong ba med pa mthong zhes bya/ /yod pa med pa'ang yod

ces bya/ /mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni/ /ma sgoms na ni rnam par sgoms/ /ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba/ /de dag gis ni lta ba bshig /gang las sangs rgyas smon pa yi/ /de dag chos rnams zhig pa med/ /ji ltar

thub pas bstan pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blos mthong ba/ /de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed/ /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ /chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan/ /des ni

brtson blo brten pa de/ /mos pa bye ba rab tu ston/ /yod dang med pa shes byas te/ /gang gis 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste/ /yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' ye shes blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas/ /snang ba'i bdag cag shes par gyur/ /phyogs bcu

kun tu snang ba yi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong / /sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa/ /de ni sems can g.yang sa ste/ /'di la ci yang yod pa min/ /tshig gis lam rnams bsdus pa'o/ /byis pa 'dzin dang
bcas pa rnams/ /bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la/ /sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med/ /yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing / /gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa/ /de dag

bskal pa grangs med du/ /srid pa'i gang chen mtsho na 'khor/ /nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad/ /nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang / /rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo / /'khor zhes bya ba

brda yin te/ /mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin/ /'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa/ /bla ma dag ni mi shes so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di/ /'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ /

tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log /zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji ltar bar/ /gang gis zhi ba zhes gyur pa/ /des ni tshigs gi lam 'das pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong / /chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa yin/ /rab tu

brjod pa bstan pa med/ /'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du lta/ /rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/ /thog ma dang ni tha mar yang / /'gal med rtsa ba med pas na/ /des nas sangs rgyas

de phyir brjod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam
pa'i phyir/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla/ /de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab/ /ci phyir zhe na bskal pa rnams/ /grangs med sdug bsngal can byung bar/ /'on kyang bde
gshegs ma thos pas/ /bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo/ /de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams/ /yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te/ /gang la grags pa med pa rnams/ /de dag byang chub bla na med/ /sangs rgyas

rnams dang mngon sum pa/ /sngan cad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos/ /de dag mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du/ /gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa ni/ /
de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs pa/ /yang dag blta bas shin tu mthong / /yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs/ /yang dag min par yang dag min/ /'di yi mtha' ni sten pas na/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
zhes kyang bya/ /khong du ma chud chos bstan te/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams dbang du brjod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bsgom pa ste/ /gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no/ /de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa/ /mang po
dag tu rnam par shes/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /bstsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas/ /byas pa med cing byed pa med/ /las kyi 'du shes rnam bsgoms shing / /las 'di ci bzhin shes par bya/ /
rnam pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yis/ /nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can chen po bla na
med/ /sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/ /'jug par bya ba gang yang med/ /de bas bla na med par bya/ /gang la phra ba yod min pa/ /de la sbom pa 'ang yod pa min/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis

brnyes/ /rnam par mi rtogs 'dus ma byas/ /gang gis sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /de la bgrang ba yod pa min/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /mun pa rnams ni rnam
bsal cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang / /de la snang ba gang yang med/ /mi snang ba'ang ci yang med/ /thams cad chos la kun nas dga'/ /skyes pa med cing gnas pa med/ /'dod chags
med cing rten pa med/ /chos nyid de yang sbed pa med/ /grangs gnyis su yang bgrang med cing / /gcig kyang yod med tha yin pas/ /ci bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi/ /shes rab chen pos legs par mthong / /
mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med/ /gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste/ /stong pa de yang khams gsum kun/ /de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/ /byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang / /de dag de la rab tu gnas/ /gnas
pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /rang gi lus ni rjes su lta/ /lus med pa'i lus su bshad/ /'byung ba med cing bstan du med/ /'jig tshogs mang po ltar med pa/ /sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med/ /

sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /de skad bden pa'i blos smras te/ /de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs/ /shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas
kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir/ /skyes bu drang srong chen po'i mchog gi rnams/ /dpa' po chen po
sems can gtso bo dang / /'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung / /thugs rje chen po skyed mdzad de/ /sems can khams la rnam gzigs kyang / /srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i/ /sems can rnams ni
de nas gzigs/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na/ /yang dag sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba/ /sems can gtso bo ma gtogs par/ /skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang med/ /gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes pa/ /
byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag /med na 'jig rten khams kun na/ /sems can bde ba gcig mi 'byung / /sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas skyes pa dang / /
byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag /'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu/ /gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthong ba/ /de dag 'thob pa legs par 'thob/ /gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba/ /de yang 'jig rten
mchod rten no/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyis 'thob legs thob/ /'di 'dra ba yi tshul thos pas/ /kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal
'di yod/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas/ /spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas/ /da dung phyir zhing dad pa skye/ /
de yi ye shes mtha' yas pas/ /da dung brjod du yod pa min/ /gang zhig mchog gi blos smras pa/ /rgyal sras gzhan gyis bshad pa rnams/ /de dag da rung bdag gis kyang / /bskal pa bsam
yas bshad par bya/ /ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //shu b+ham//
